text: Hatman, qit'ahoi ohan ʙarojam ʙijovared [va rūji ham ʙicined]», to vaqte komilan mijoni du kūhro ʙaroʙar soxt [va pūşond. Sipas] guft: «[Dar atrofi devorai ohanin otaş ʙijafrūzed va] dar on ʙidamed». [Onon cunin kardand] To vaqte on [qitaoti ohan]-ro gudoxta kard; [sipas] guft: «[Aknun] misi oʙşuda ʙarojam ʙijovared, to rūji on [devor] ʙirezam»
